title: About
text: Kyler Adams is a photojournalist who has covered sports ranging from the high school level all the way up to NCAA National Championships.

library(ggbump)


This is a test second sentence.


Code
D1WeeklyRankings <- read.csv("data/D1Baseball 2025 Rankings.csv")

ggplot() +
  geom_bump(data=D1WeeklyRankings, aes(x=Week, y=Rank, color=Team, group=Team)) + ## This line is 
  geom_point(data=D1WeeklyRankings, aes (x=Week, y=Rank, color=Team, group=Team), size = 4) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(0:14), limits =c(-1.75,15.75)) +
  geom_text(data = D1WeeklyRankings |> filter(Week == min(Week)), aes(x = Week - .4, y=Rank, label = Team), size = 3, hjust = 1) +
  geom_text(data = D1WeeklyRankings |> filter(Week == max(Week)), aes(x = Week + .4, y=Rank, label = Team), size = 3, hjust = 0) +
  scale_y_reverse(breaks=c(0:10))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("lightgrey", "#9D2235", "lightgrey", "lightgrey","lightgrey","lightgrey","lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey", "lightgrey","lightgrey", "lightgrey","lightgrey","lightgrey","lightgrey","lightgrey")) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    panel.grid.minor.y=element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y=element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank()
  )
